name: Adrian Spanu
bio: I work as a software engineer full time. One of the larger codebases I work in is a set of microservices written in Go. I'm not an expert in Go, but I've started to figure out my way around it. Happy to help others trying to learn more!

name: Andreas Schroepfer
bio: I love Go and the Go community. I am a software engineer with 10 years experience.

name: Anuchit Prasertsang
bio: Go is a fantastic language for me. We have the Go community in Thailand is growing.

name: Arjun mahishi
bio: Go is the first compiled langauge that I was comfortable with. It is also the first langauge I wrote production worthy code in.

name: Khiman Louer
bio: Go is a beautiful language with an amazing community. I use it everyday working as a freelance developer for many clients.

name: Andrés Zarta
bio: Data Scientist with Operations Research background. Started learning Go to improve my software development skills and ended up loving it for its simplicity and amazing community.

name: Antonio De Leon
bio: I'm an experienced engineer with a background in DevOps and current focus on Cybersecurity.  I enjoy Go and the community that supports it!

name: Aditya Tekur
bio: Not an expert by any means in Golang, but am open to learning everyday and providing valuable feedback to the people who are Go enthusiasts.
